DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate whether addition whey protein breakfast high carbohydrate content influence acute metabolic appetite response , well responses subsequent lunch meal .
DOC.brief_title: Metabolic Appetite Parameters Following Addition Whey Protein Carbohydrate-based Breakfast
DOC.criteria: Aged 1840 year old ( male ) Recreationally active ( > 30 minute structure exercise , 5 times/week ) Metabolic disease ( e.g . Type 2 diabetes , thyroid disorder ) Taking prescribed medication Regular breakfast skipper Food allergy intolerances Eating disorder Smoker
